vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: LibRichErrorsV06.rrevert (LibMathV06.sol#49-56) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
vulnerability_findings.message:
LibRichErrorsV06.rrevert uses assembly (LibMathV06.sol#49-56)
	- LibMathV06.sol#53-55

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in LibMathV06.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.6.5 (LibMathV06.sol#21): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.6.5 (LibMathV06.sol#79): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.6.5 (LibMathV06.sol#159): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.6.5 (LibMathV06.sol#349): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.6.5 (LibMathV06.sol#409): it allows old versions
